Pre-Game Insights: Lithuania are most likely in for a tough match when welcoming Cyprus at Dariaus Ir Gireno Stadium. They are favoured by the bookmakers for the win, but it could get tight on Friday.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Both Lithuania and Cyprus are having a hard time finding their way to the net.
Others: Lithuania have conceded in 18 of the last 20 home matches
Lithuania have not won 14 of the last 16 home matches
In 7 of the last 8 home matches Lithuania played, both teams scored
In 12 of the last 14 Lithuania matches in the UEFA Nations League C, the sum of goals was under 3.5
In the last 3 Lithuania matches in the UEFA Nations League C, the sum of goals was under 1.5
In the last 11 Cyprus away matches the sum of goals was over 2.5
Cyprus have not won 22 of the last 24 away matches
Cyprus have not won the last 10 away matches in a row in the UEFA Nations League C
Cyprus have conceded in 23 of the last 25 away matches
In 9 of the last 10 Cyprus away matches the sum of goals was over 3.5
